rundlgornn was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Grundlgornn was a tan-skinned beardless dwarf with short and dark curly hair.
In the , Grundlgornn found himself listening to a curbside preacher of Talona, Umbrenne, spewing out his beliefs of the cycle of life and death being carried out through pestilence. Despite not being interested in the Talonite faith, Grundlgornn was terrified of the priests promises of plagues.
